subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=卜,要,勃-Min Dong,剝-Min Dong}}
From the grammaticalization of {{och-l|發|to send out; to go forth; to proceed}} ({{zh-ref|Tu, 2017}}).
